title: (20240) Ordizia - 1 Oiangurenaldea
description: Oiangu Park and picnic area. public baths and in txiringito versno

title: (20200) Beasain - Carretera Nacional
description:
Exit direction France: exit at the indication of the gas station and just past this there is a road that crosses the road below on the other side. exit in direction Madrid: exit 419 in the totonda 3rd exit and 20 meters on the left pass under the railway bridge.
There is a small blue area in the parking lot, but most of it is a free zone.
This is the parking lot of the ambulatory or health center. 2 minutes walk is the center of the town with pintxos bars and the entire commercial area. 200 meters away at the gas station there is the other point for emptying water.

title: (20240) Ordizia - 11 San Bartolome Kalea
description: Parking next to the Eroski supermarket and gas station. No loading or unloading services very close to the town with a beautiful old town. On Wednesdays there is a market that has been held for 500 years

title: (20200) Beasain - 2B A-1
description: Repsol service station, draining gray and black water, filled with drinking water. If you refuel it is free, otherwise the service costs. Totally recommended.

title: (20210) Lazkao - 925 Iturgaitzaga Kalea
description: Parking next to the city

title: (20200) Beasain - 47 Nafarroa Etorbidea
description: Nice and clean laundry open from 8:00-22:00. There are 2 machines of 10kg and 2 of 20kg and 2 dryers

title: (20210) Lazkao - 1 Lazkao Barreiatua
description: Cool park in summer made up of oak trees by the river. Accessible site, with free parking 20 meters away, ideal for walking on a flat track, with picnic areas and benches, a fountain and a fenced area for dogs to play. Located in front of one of the most beautiful historical complexes in Euskalherria.

title: (20200) Beasain - 1 Igartza Oleta Kalea
description: Motorhome friendly Shops just in the front building. Bar Akelarre (Nice txorizo tapas) Zuhaizpe bar(opening 6 AM) nice breakfast, lunch/dinner for less than a fiver. Saltsamendi butcher is famous for their blood sausage. Free Wifi (akelarre bar)Service area with tokens to be taken from local merchants

title: (20212) Olaberria - 6 Gainera Auzoa
description: Quiet recreational area next to residential area. It has several benches with tables, a fountain and a wastebasket. Please respect the environment and collect your rubbish. Leave the place better than you found it.

title: (20212) Olaberría - 927 Calle Zebazelai
description: Picnic area in one of the most beautiful viewpoints in Goierri, between the Aizkorri and Aralar mountains. It has a fountain, tables, barbecue, and public toilets a few meters away. From here you can make beautiful excursions. Nice urban farmhouse, with two highly appreciated restaurants in the region.

title: (20247) Zaldivia - 904 Kalea Santa Fe
description: Free parking in Zaldibia, next to the Sierra de Aralar, with 2 fountains nearby, several playgrounds for children and walk on the river with weight machines. The town has public baths nearby and several bars / restaurants, butcher shop ... Very quiet area and close to various mountain outings and mountain biking.

title: (20212) Gipuzkoa - 22W Lugar Harizti Industrialdea
description: BP service station. You can buy the 12 kg gas cylinders. The greats of Repsol. It has toilets and showers (at least for truckers, I don't know if for the rest). It has a Maxi China in front of it.

title: (20250) Legorreta - 2 Garikano Auzoa Auzoa
description: Gas station. Bar Restaurant. 3rd showers. We can fill the water too. No emptying for water

title: (20218) Beasain - 34 Barrio Arriaran
description: It may depend on the height of the water in the swamp. You can get to the shore itself. The entrance is a bit steep but at the bottom there is room to turn around.

title: (20259) Baliarrain - 1 Herriz Gora Aldea
description: Quiet place, with water, tables, barbecue, swings. routes and spectacular views

title: (20211) Ataún - 918 Elbarrena Auzoa
description: Parking in the same town access walks along the bank of the beautiful river as well as tracks to go to the very quiet town without sleeping problems do not forget to buy cheese at the bar

title: (20216) Ormaiztegi - 27-31 San Andres Kalea
description: Parking without services. Very quiet for night and day. In front of the Zumalakarregi Museum.

title: (20211) Astigarraga - 3W Lugar Barrio Astigarraga
description: Sports hall parking. During the day, the sports center is open and has a toilet.

title: (20213) Idiazabal - 11 Zepai Kalea
description: Place away from the town where you can spend a quiet time and even sleep. We stayed to eat and left, no problem. Nearby is the cheese interpretation center, highly recommended.

title: (20269) Orendain - Egileor Aldea
description: Ibiur reservoir dam, very close to the a1, beautiful road around the reservoir, ideal for spending the night on the road. Access by road to baliarrain. Do not go under the dam following the gps.

title: (20214) Segura - 1 Goiko Arrabal Aldea
description: Secure parking. Quiet and well located municipal parking. Attached to a playground, where you can catch the water. There are several bars and restaurants nearby for a drink or use the bathrooms. Beautiful little town of medieval style, surrounded by nature and very good atmosphere. There are several routes for walking, going to the mountains or cycling.

title: (20269) Abaltzisketa - 11A Larraitz Auzoa
description: Parking night and day, picnic area, WC

title: (20730) Azpeitia - Eizagirre Auzoa
description: Roadside near the lake but with enough space to settle and enjoy the peace and greenery. tranquility assured.

title: (20709) Guipúzcoa - 15 Ezkio Diseminado Barreiatua
description: Parking of the farm Igartubeiti, is a museum of caserio with an interpretation center. It is an ideal visit with children to understand the way of life of our ancestors. Free parking and no prohibitions is a small parking but PERFECT to spend a quiet night in the countryside. There are stone benches. The interpretation center has some services.

title: (20730) Azpeitia -
description: Lakeside with mountain views. Winding road, and sometimes with lots of greenery. Calm and restful.

title: (20739) Beizama - Unnamed Road
description: A little further along than the original site is an access point for fishing and, I presume, to launch boats. There is level parking up top for a single van, maybe two.  It’s at the 1km marker.  We spent 4 nights here and explored San Sebastián and Bilbao on day trips.  Very private with dog walkers and the like your only company.

title: (20268) Amezketa - 17 Altunegiko Auzoa
description: Quiet place to spend the night with a van. Picnic with tables, fountain and WC. There is a small bar. Hiking trails can be arranged. The site is small, not suitable for motorhomes.

title: () Beizama - Amenabar Auzoa
description: Peaceful night at the edge of the Ibaieder dam. Location for van or van.

title: (20211) Ataún - 12 Ergoiena Auzoa Auzoa
description: Parking with 6 places to spend the night. We came here because right next to it there is a cider house that has spectacular dinner. We have spent a quiet night with the Del Rio sound. It is close to the road but at night hardly any cars pass. Highly recommended for sleeping and eating, it is also very close to the Txindoki natural park.

title: (20214) Zerain - 54 Aizpea Auzoa
description: (Eus/Cast) Eus: minak bisitatu eta mendi buelta bat emateko leku aproposa, lo egitea dago lasaitasun osoz. Cast: appropriate car park to visit the Zerain mines and take a walk around the mountain. You can sleep peacefully.

title: (20268) Altzo - 89 Txaparre Aldea Barreiatua
description: Village car park, behind the pediment and next to the very nicely decorated school. Quiet, lit by a few lampposts, with a nice view. Next to it, the statue of the giant character of Altzo who was born in this town and was famous for being over 2.20 m high.

title: (20496) Bidania-Goiatz - 25 Calle Agerre
description: Very quiet place without services but with spectacular views. There are no services but if you like spending the night on your own and you are en route, it is a very good alternative to be calm, especially if you go with children since you have a park nearby.

title: (20700) Zumarraga - 46 Beloki Hiribidea
description: Cemetery parking lot high up in the city. ideal for visiting the city and the hermitage of Antigua. we spent the day seeing for one night.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 306 Eizagirre Auzoa Auzoa
description: A small car park on the side of the road will accommodate 3-4 motor homes. A water stream is running around the car park creating a very pleasant sound. Quiet at night good for overnight stay.

title: (20700) Zumarraga - 32 Kalebarren Kalea
description: Quiet, free parking near the Center of Urretxu with availability of shops (supermarket, cafeteria ...)

title: (20700) - 38W Lugar Diseminados
description: Parking near the hermitage of San Cristóbal, quiet place, ideal to go out into the mountains, there is a fountain, but no containers there

title: (20213) Idiazabal - 22 Ursuaran Diseminado Auzoa
description: A resting place, on the hill. Spent one night here in late November. Standing behind the hotel on the corner, so we are a bit away from the road and not block the truck seats. There were no problems and it was surprisingly quiet (for a rest stop).

title: (20215) Zegama - 13 San Bartolome Kalea
description: Motorhome area with all services, along with picnic area and children's play park. Next door to the interpretation centre for the natural park. Elevator access to the village below which has a couple of small supermarkets, and a handful of bars and restaurants. Steep and winding access road. Not suitable for vehicles longer 7m.

title: (20215) Zegama - 7 Dintialdea Auzoa
description: Next to a picnic area with barbecue. Quiet. the road is not busy. We hear that the bells of cows and sheep. Be careful to come and go to the right of the city, on the left the way is limited to 1m70. Large camping car abstain, the road is sometimes narrow.

title: (20220) Legazpi - 8 Telleriarte Diseminado Barreiatua
description: Motorhome area next to the iron museum. There is a park with swings and a picnic area with tables. Parking is shared with cars going to the museum.

title: (20400) Usabal - 109 Usabal Auzoa Auzoa
description: Industrial area parking, fairly supervised, a little noisy but a stone's throw from the San Ignacio workshop for caravans

title: (20400) Tolosa - 15C Iurramendi Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Parking without services, not exclusive for motorhomes. Located in quiet neighborhood residential area near the Camino de Santiago. Few places, there are mostly cars

title: (20400) San Blas - 904 Iruña Hiribidea
description: Huge parking aside road, but not noisy,

title: (20211) Ataun - GI-2120
description: Lizarrusti Recreation Area, Aralar Interpretation Center Parking, there are picnic areas, a fountain and a children's play park.

title: (20220) Brinkola - 911 Lugar Barrio Brinkola
description: Picnic area next to the Urola river, three tables and a fountain in the shade of the alders. Renfe commuter station nearby.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 910 Usabal Auzoa
description: Free parking Sports area Usabai. removed from the center of Tolosa, close to the N 1. noisy due to the passage of vehicles of the National

title: (20700) Urretxu - 40Y Lugar Diseminados
description: Very quiet area to sleep and rest. recently conditioned place with impressive views of Zumárraga and Urretxu. SILENT!!!

title: (20700) Urretxu - 40 Diseminados Barreiatua
description: Parking Santa Bárbara with 2 parking areas on 2 sides of the road. Space with bar-restaurant-inn, fountain, picnic areas, children's playground and starting point for hiking and mountain biking. The parking is a bit uphill. The source is non-chlorinated water.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 30 San Esteban Auzoa
description: Motorhome area just minutes from the historic center of the municipality. With a rich historical and cultural heritage, Tolosa is well known for its cuisine and typical local products. To find motorhome Aire pass the two carparks into industrial area. You will find services on left and parking on right.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 23B Lugar Barrio San Esteban
description: Municipal motorhome area near the center without shade.

title: (20220) Legazpi - 14 Brinkola Diseminado Barreiatua
description: Quiet corner next to the river, just below a water retention, 1 place to not interfere with access

title: (20700) Zumarraga - 23 Aginaga Auzoa Auzoa
description: Small hamlet with parking for the night on the super quiet place

title: (20400) Tolosa - 31 San Blas Auzoa Auzoa
description: Asphalt parking next to the town and next to the road.

title: (20215) Zegama - 2A Otzaurte Auzoa Auzoa
description: Parking next to the Otzaurte restaurant and bar. Very good menu and own cheese production. It is advisable to book, it is usually full. Regular start to go up to the Aizkorri- Aratz natural park. Flat and with a play area. Mountaineers move in the morning. Climbing area in Garagarza. 10 ways.

title: (20400) Ibarra - 1 Egialde Aldea
description: Parking outside the school, on weekends a very quiet place. There is a picnic area with tables, rubbish bins, a fountain and a barbecue.

title: (20490) Lizartza - 9 Askatasunaren Plaza
description: Parking to be able to stop to rest, see the town. We did not stay to sleep in the camper. Very quiet town you will only hear the sheep and roosters in the area.

title: (20400) Tolosa - 13 Izaskungo Aldapa
description: Level ground parking in a very quiet place with very nice views towards the mountains of Tolosa

title: (31810) Urdiain - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful area with a small hermitage with a porch and table. There are municipal swimming pools and from this point there are several routes. there is also a climbing area.

title: (20730) Azpeitia -
description: New filling and emptying area (gray and black) in Azpeitia. Overnight accommodation is allowed (3 nights maximum).  It is right next to a large field with picnic tables, etc. A bit out of the center, but to be free ...

title: (20215) Beunda Txabola - Unnamed Road
description: Place to spend the night in the heart of the Aizkorri mountain range. Picnic tables and a covered free shelter with a table and a fire area. There was a fountain, but it is bypassed without a tap. Perfect for a good morning ride through the mountains.

title: (20494) Alkiza - 15E Alkiza Plaza
description: Spacious and quiet parking next to the cemetery of the village of Alkiza. there are beautiful views of the valleys and Basque hamlets and Mount Ernio

title: (20490) Orexa - 9A Errebote Plaza
description: It is an ideal place to stop and see the town. I recommend it because it is a beautiful town, the guy from the restaurant bar next door is a charm and cooks very well.

title: (31810) Urdiain - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful area to spend a night away from the town. Surrounded by centenary oaks, space for several camper. It has tables and garbage.

title: (20730) Loiola - 2 Loiola Auzoa Gunea
description: Perfect parking for visiting the Basilica of Loiola, there is no problem to spend the night. From the neighboring bidegorri you reach the center in 10 minutes. 4h maximum parking

title: (20730) Loiola - 10 Loiola Auzoa Gunea
description: Lawn Sanctuary parking, well located and quiet for sleeping

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 18 Loiola Auzoa Gunea
description: Perfect to spend the night I was talking to the police that happens often. This next to the other Parking that is the hotel but that is very small, this is better for our motorhomes.

title: (20730) Loiola - 16 Loiola Auzoa Gunea
description: Parking on the right of the Basilica. Quiet, shaded, bike path. Toilets and garbage cans.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 902 Bidea Loiolako Ignazio Hiribidea
description: Quiet parking in a residential area and close to a walk from the town in one direction and from the sanctuary in another. We were there during the day but there are no prohibitions on spending the night.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 20 Loiolako Inazio Hiribidea
description: Small car park next to a monument and away from the main street. The neighbors park their vehicles and motorhomes there. Very close to the Loiola Sanctuary. We were quiet despite our proximity to the city.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 26 Loiolako Inazio Hiribidea
description: [EUSKAL HERRIA ezagutzen] This is the school car park. Next to it there are tables and benches where you can eat... There are public toilets and a water tap. Don't forget not to throw any trash on the ground, let's take care of the environment! See you soon!

title: (31800) Altsasu - 20 San Pedroko Bidea
description: Picnic areas with a fountain and barbecues.

title: (31800) Altsasu - 20 San Pedroko Bidea
description: Former football field converted into parking during the summer season to access the municipal swimming pools. The rest of the year can also be used. Magnificent oak Interpretive area of the use of oaks in the old ship construction. Curious. House tree. Merenderos with fountain. Bar managed by very nice people. Take care not to remove awnings or tables to continue enjoying this site.

title: (20720) Azkoitia - 2 Txerloia Auzoa Auzoa
description: Flat dead end street 2 minutes walk from the Dia supermarket and the gas station. Although it is close to the road, it is very quiet, especially during the week, being between tennis courts and a soccer field, I imagine that the weekend will not be so. Table to eat and free water outlet, that if you require a certain adapter as shown in the image.

title: (20809) Aia - 12A Iruretaegia Auzoa Auzoa
description: Wonderful starting point for hiking and mountaineering. Lots of local walkers on weekends. Deafeningly quiet at night. Flat asphalt to stand on. Sun and shade.

title: (20270) Irura - 5 Zillar Kalea
description: Next to the motorway, perfect for a night when you are travelling. Nice for water change. There is a family oriented bar/restaurant first floor where you can have lunch/dinner. Free Wifi in the bar. Park for children and traditional basque pelota (trinquete) matches can be seen from the restaurant. Motorhome friendly owner.

title: (20730) Azpeitia - 25 Izarraitz Auzoa Auzoa
description: Very ample parking at the edge of the road to rest, spend the night or something on the way.

title: (20720) Azkoitia - 30 Caracter Julio Urkixo Etorbidea
description: Free parking area close to town center. Walking distance to historic sighs, parks, restaurants and swimming pool. Drinking water freely available  from many water taps all around town. No other services. Quiet peaceful parking.

title: (31800) Altsasu - 24 Calle Aminanespila
description: Parking car and camper next to the future sports center Alsasua, a few meters from the historic center, quiet place. Walks in the mountains and pools in summer. A beautiful environment

title: (20577) Bergara - 39 Elosu Auzoa Auzoa
description: Parking of a recreational facility with picnic tables. Isolated place in the mountains by the roadside.

title: (20569) Oñati - 1647 Ugarkalde Auzoa
description: Very quiet parking. There are always CCs.

title: (31800) Alsasua - 7 Calle Amaya
description: Nice laundromat, supermarket and playgrond for kids is near

title: (31800) Alsasua - 3 Calle Soldaubide
description: It is a parking lot in an urbanization near the old town of Alsasua, a beautiful mountain view, a children's park, a bakery near and a fountain with water, walks to the mountains and San Pedro

title: (20720) Azcoitia - 10 Aizkibel Kalea
description: Next to the Casco Viejo, flat, quiet and shady place.

title: (20159) - 910 Zilar Kalea
description: Parking of all kinds of vehicles, on the outskirts of town. With shadow. Silent A route leaves right next to

title: (20159) Asteasu - GI-2631
description: Zona de picnic

title: (20159) Asteasu - 7 Ibarrazpi Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Ideal place to rest and spend a weekend to discover their customs and gastronomy. Car park. From the village you can go hiking in the mountains such as "Ernio" ... a real luxury.

title: (20569) Oñati - Murgia Auzoa
description: Area for motorhomes. Nice, quiet place to spend the night with a drain service filled with water. Access is not well marked. Ideal for visiting the city as well as for approaching the various activities in the region.

name: Bar-Restaurante Camping Etxarri
title: (31820) Bar-Restaurante Camping Etxarri
description: Camping Etxarri - with all services, a bit neglected and old, the toilets are a bit neglected. Surrounded by nature. Price according to season and type of terrain

title: (20159) Asteasu - 6 Eliz Kalea
description: Quiet, parking in the Center of Asteasu.

title: (31800) Altsasu - 18 Avenida Pamplona
description: Perfect spot for water draining and refilling. We provide free service if you refuel. Supermarket and restaurant only 50 meters away, and less than 1 kilometer from town centre. Urbasa-Andia natural park only 5 kilometers away.

title: (31800) Alsasua - 18A Avenida Pamplona
description: Land esplanade at the end of the street next to the supermarket, fuel station and police.

title: (20560) Oñati - 2A Arantzazuko Ama Kalea
description: Self service laundry

title: () Sierra Aralar - NA-7510
description: Sierra de Aralar parking space

title: (20560) Oñati - 2 Ibarra Zelaia Zelaigunea
description: University parking enabled for vehicles over 5m, very well by the Oñati town hall since the area was full. The bad thing is the noise from the factory, I don't know if you will hear it in the back parking lot although it is not a very annoying noise if you hear

title: (20150) Villabona - Legarreta Auzoa
description: Beautiful, quiet park with shops and bars to visit, bike path and the train station nearby to visit San Sebastian.

title: (20492) Berastegi - 1 Elizalde Auzoa
description: Parking next to the huge village church in centre of rural valley. Quiet place without services. PR marked walk around valley starts here, as well as another short walk. Completely flat. Some amenities in village.

title: (20567) Oñati - 2 Arantzazu Auzoa Auzoa
description: Asphalted parking for vehicles, access to motorhomes is good, the parking spaces are narrow and long enough, we with a 6m without problem, next to the sanctuary of Aranzazu, fairly flat. We spent the night in 4 motorhomes and 4 campers, a bit of wind during the night but we had a good night. Several routes starting from the parking lot.

title: () - NA-7510
description: Parking for the night in the park

title: (31820) Etxarri-Aranatz - 5 Ikastola Kalea
description:
Motorhome area with free emptying and filling. It is located in the middle of the town
surrounded by mountains with the possibility of walking routes.
It is an open field with tables to eat outside. The squares A.C. they are delimited.

title: (20150) Zizurkil - 17 Ernio Bidea
description: Quiet parking for the night and day. gravel parking, is level, has street lighting and garbage containers. shops, bars and square 100 meters

title: (31877) Gorriti - Area de Servicio
description: Rest area No service. Toilets of the station.

title: (20567) Oñati - 5 Arantzazu Auzoa
description: Quiet parking near the sanctuary in which the Basilica is located with its impressive facade tower and torre. Possibility of spending a quiet night there without any problem.

title: (20569) Oñati - 26A Garagaltza Auzoa Auzoa
description: Drinking water source.

title: (20159) - 909 Lugar Zizurkil Nucleo
description: Parking at the entrance of Zizurkil Arriba. Very quiet, next to a church and the road. Few noises at night, cars do not usually pass, except at rush hour when there is a bit more hustle and bustle. Have we ever seen motorhomes stay overnight as well. Good views.

title: (20567) Oñati - 41 Arantzazu Auzoa Auzoa
description: Room for 1 or 2 vans with a nice view and a few meters walk from the cheese factory / shepherds school, small picnic area and fountain.

title: (31830) Lakuntza - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with a water point, a table and a small bench. all at the edge of a road with very little traffic, opposite the table there is shade. very useful when it's hot

title: (20150) Villabona - 35X Lugar Barrio Otelarre
description: Esplanade of land next to the door of the Hika Winery. The winery is visited and they are very friendly. Space for more than 20 vehicles with no clearance limit.

title: (20569) Oñati - 14 Torreauzo Auzoa
description: Alternative parking to the main one to go for a swim in the nearby pools. Very calm. there is a company next door so it may not be usable on weekdays. Saturday was very quiet (alone).

title: (20569) Oñate - 15 Barrio Zañartu
description: Natural pools with fountain and 2 showers. Parking in the surroundings.

title: (31809) Olazti - 13 Inguraketa Kalea
description: Parking next to the Olazti fronton. Quiet place without noise near Urbasa. Olaztiko frontoiaren ondoko aparkalekua. Lasaia bear, zaratarik gabekoa eta Urbasako parke naturaletik gertu.

title: (20150) Villabona - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area "Komizar" with picnic tables and barbecues. Narrow paved road.

title: (01250) Araia - 3 Dotalar Kalea
description: Ideal place to spend the night and do some hiking, there is little place, ideal for vans. There is no toilet. If for garbage, the town is 10 minutes walk

title: (20569) Oñate - 15W Barrio Zañartu
description: Parking area next to the usako bathing area! Magnificent area to spend a summer day

title: (01250) Araia - 30 Salsamendi Kalea
description: Parking at Fundición Ajuria Y Urigoitia S.A. an abandoned steelworks that is the parking for the start of a hike up to a beautiful waterfall that used to power the factory. We didn't sleep here, just went for the hike but no signs prohibiting overnight stay. It's relatively flat in places and shade possible from a huge tree. Cool to explore the abandoned factory, could be a little spooky at night!

title: (31877) Gorriti - NA-4011
description: Hardly traveled road. We have spent the night here, on a small esplanade next to the small road. Very quiet to sleep. No services. Cattle are heard and we saw a small deer.

title: (20570) Bergara - 10 Ibargarai Hiribidea
description: Laundry

title: (20570) Bergara - 2-4 Telleria Kalea
description: Área para Autocaravanas-marked area on hard ground between a work road and a stream in the Labegaraieta industrial park, south of the centre. No shade and not always quiet during the day. Simple VE option with floor inlet at the ramp. Accessible across the river via a bridge. There is a playground with climbing frames, scate track, water fountain and descent to the river. Be careful with children on the parking side, very high steep river. Sign with points of interest and route is in the parking lot. With a payment of € 5 you can therefore get services such as a discount at a spa and on bus tickets.

title: (31809) Olazti/Olazagutía - Carr. de Urbasa
description: Small picnic area with two tables that are quite level for two vans or two small motorhomes with no height limit next to the road that leads to and from Urbasa, before there was a natural spring that is now out of service due to lack of maintenance, it also had a garbage dump

title: (31830) - 2028 Lugar Diseminado
description: Site next to a secondary road with a table and some shade to eat and / or spend the night. It is next to the train track, but in the time that we have been eating, not one has passed.

title: (20570) Bergara - 15W Ibiltokia Boni Laskurain
description: Very close to the center.

title: (01250) - 2 Calle San Martin
description: Parking area next to the pools. In a very quiet and beautiful area. Garbage bins next to it.

title: (20492) Berastegi - Aintzerga Auzoa
description: Parking, picnic area URTOKO ZUBIETA Quiet, shaded, picnic tables, barbecues, river, playground, fountain, WC open from Easter.

title: (31891) Azpirotz - Autovía de Leizarán
description: Parking along the highway to access the Mirador de Azpiroz. No services except 4G

title: (01260) - 1 Diseminado Ilarduia
description: CAVE de LEZE: parking located next to the tables with fountain and the river, with a short path that reaches the LEZE cave where the river is born. Very calm.

title: (01208) Galarreta - De Zalduendo a Araya
description: Quiet area with plenty of parking. Ideal to climb the aizkorri. There are no services. The road from the town is in bad shape.

title: (01260) Álava - 5 Lugar Leze
description: It is the first parking lot of the Cueva de la Leze, indicated with a wooden sign on the left of the road ... without restrictions, so I stopped for the night. In the shadow of a beautiful spontaneous vegetation, with birds singing, a stream that flows nearby, paths and dirt roads for walking or running ...

title: (01250) Araia - 5 Iturbero Kalea
description: Parking next to the church and the town hall. Small market 30 meters from the car park, every Thursday.

title: (20570) Bergara - 4 Antxiturri Kalea
description: Supermarket parking, one area with a height limit and another not, we had no problem spending the day.

title: (20567) Oñati - 56 Araotz Auzoa Auzoa
description: Parking of the Oñate caves. It is in the lower part of the mountain, in a very beautiful valley with many hiking trails. There is no toilet, no water.

title: (20150) Villabona - 7C Agaraitz Auzoa Auzoa
description: Cepsa service station. Open 24 hours. Small Carrefour supermarket and clean toilets. Showers

title: (01250) Araia - 4 Santsaerreka Kalea
description: Parking with a small lawn behind, quiet location

title: (20720) - 113 Lugar Barrio Madariaga
description: Quiet place and outside the parking lot, in the shade for hot days. The point is not very well located, after the edge of the curve a path appears on the right.

title: (20720) Azkoitia - 97 Madariaga Auzoa
description: Free car park, only for small camper-van because of narrow access

title: (20570) Bergara - 13 Goiauzoa
description: San Martzial. Place with a hermitage, with drinking water fountains, picnic tables and a playground. Shading.

title: (20720) Azkoitia -
description: Amazing place by the road. it is a green grass esplanade with space for many motorhomes. At the foot of the road, but it does not bother. incredible views and several fountains with drinking water. Lots of space and silence. Very easy access. Perfect to spend 2 or 3 nights.

name: Eco Camping Arbizu
title: (31839) Eco Camping Arbizu
description: Camping on the outskirts of arbizu in a beautiful and quiet place. high season price 9.5e motorhome 6.5e per person

title: (20809) Aia - 15 Joan Etorle Kalea
description: Children's playground, Parking hosteleria

title: () - NA-718
description: Nice parking, last allowed before the natural park of Urbasa Nadia. Quiet, garbage. direct access to the park with departure of walks to do Baquesano, Rio Urederra with its turquoise waters.

title: (31879) Baraibar -
description: Perfect place to do notxe before making a route through the Sierra de Aralar

title: (20740) - 12W Bainuetxeko Errepidea
description: Parked here to eat and walk the dog.

title: (20809) Gipuzkoa - GI-2631
description: On a hill, but we managed to sleep very well for one night. Light traffic during the night.

title: (01208) Galarreta - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area for exits on foot and btt routes through the Sierra de Urkilla (south-west part of the Aratz-Aitzkorri Natural Park. Several marked trails. There is a nearby winding. Very quiet and very cool views. It is accessed from the village of Galarreta for a track in very good condition.

title: (20740) Zestoa -
description: Nice view, fountsin is down on Road but when Drive Up u see, some tablets and chairs, calm place at night

title: (20740) Zestoa - 1 Lugar Alonderoko Aldapa
description: Rich flowing drinking water source, you can fill water bottles here. The locals do this too.

title: (31840) Uharte-Arakil - Calle monte Aralar, s/n
description: A parking with spectacular views at 1200 meters altitude. Good place for trekking and mountain biking. Without services, only parking. Access from the south is not asphalted, the road is made of concrete, but it is in good condition

title: (31879) Baraibar - Unnamed Road
description: Bit further on from the other spot, went further up the trail, on a Defender so no trouble but 4x4 needed. Beautiful remote spot in the woods absolute peace

title: (31879) Astitz - NA-7510
description: Nice place to sleep, with capacity for 3-4 well-placed campers. good alternative to sanruari if it is a windy day

title: (20740) Zestoa - 5 Manuel Uztapide Plaza
description: Municipal sports center of the town. Very friendly people, clean facilities

title: (20740) Zestoa - 911 Toribio Altzaga Kalea
description: Service area very quiet, very close to the city center, free drain, 8 km from the beach of Zumaia by bus or bike path. Cave with rock paintings near the area.

name: Camping Urbasa
title: () Camping Urbasa
description: , Carretera de Urbasa

title: (20590) Soraluze - San Andres Auzoa / Barrio
description: Space in the nature with a magnificent view of the valley, with a small playground, a pediment and a source. Following the road to the mountain, you will arrive at the car park which starts the route of the dolmens

title: (20809) -
description: Toilets closed. don't crap around the place it's really disgusting. small effort to buy a (foldable) spade and dig yourself a pit in the woods.

title: (01208) Zalduondo - 53 Torre-Larre Auzoa
description: Picnic area with four tables, fountain and swings. It is good to eat after a visit to the museum of rural carnivals.

title: (31880) Leitza - 12 Polígono P II - Landa
description: Parking by the river, there are swings for the kids. 200 meters from the village

title: (20140) Andoain - 2 Txitibar Plaza
description: Self-service laundry with washing machines and dryers. There is also a dog washing station. Open Monday to Sunday 8AM-22PM. Supermarket, bars and restaurants around.

title: (31880) Leitza - Patxi Arrazola Kalea
description: Former train station Plazaola. Along the Greenway. Quiet parking for day and night. Next to the fountain. Small only for van. Super 4G reception, no shadow.

title: (20140) Andoain - 53W Leizotz Auzoa
description: Parking giving access to the Leizaran valley. Ideal for mountain biking and fishing.

title: (20809) Aia - 11 Urdaneta Auzoa Barreiatua
description: Parkingplace at side of the road. Bit noisy of cars coming by. But beautifull view in the morning of zarautz.

title: (20749) Zestoa - 10Y Endoia Diseminados Auzoa
description: Magnificent panorama over the valley and the ocean, the car park is at the end of the road just next to the antennas. no services.

title: (20749) Zestoa -
description: While searching for one of the already available places in park4night, which were all crowded, we found this tiny little space at the side of a conjunction. Good for one night with a quite nice view. Very quiet. Police came by in the morning and was very friendly (we said we are going to leave soon).

title: (31840) Uharte-Arakil - Calle Felipe Gorriti
description: Great place to stop for lunch or spend the day. It has 4 wooden tables, recycling bins and a descent to the river and everything.

title: (20809) Gipuzkoa - GI-2631
description: Very nice parking lot for a break. Unfortunately with a height limit of 1.85 m. There is space for 1-2 larger cars in front of it. Lots of shaded picnic tables and playground. Also a good place to start hikes.

title: (20140) Andoain - 1 Sorabilla Auzoa
description:
Parking in the polygon,
access to the town in 5'.
No services.
Close to the highway, a bit noisy.
Little fuss on the weekend,
midweek things will change!!!!

title: (20140) Andoain - Txistoki Pasealekua Ibilbidea
description: Very quiet parking in town. Good access from the N1 and easy to park. Services of all kinds within walking distance (supermarket, greengrocer, butcher, cafeteria...) Perfect for spending a night, stocking cupboards and getting to know Andoain and the Leizaran natural park and its 25 km greenway by bike. You cannot park on Tuesday and Saturday mornings as there is a market.

title: (20140) Andoain - 19 Kale Nagusia Kalea
description: DO Laundry self-service laundry

title: (01207) San Román - Acceso a San Román de San Millán
title_short: (01207) San Román - Acceso a San Román de San Millán
description: Parking in sports center of a small but cozy town, with children's area, in full nature, very quiet area. Water from a natural source about 150 meters.

address.street: Acceso a San Román de San Millán

title: (20140) Andoain - 15 Extremadura Kalea
description: Parking without services in the upper part of Andoain. Level. Very calm. Easy access. Close to the cycle route.

title: (31840) Uharte-Arakil - 50 Calle Itxesi
description: New parking with service, gray water and sewage disposal, electricity and water. Nearby is a playground.

title: (20749) Endoia -
description: Good for 1 night

title: (20500) Arrasate - 909 Lugar Barrio Musakola
description: Nice quiet place next to the village and next to the Burger King there. From the AP1 exit Arreseta. We couldn't find a stopping place along the AP1 and turned off haphazardly. That turned out to be a good choice.

name: Área de Servicio Andamur San Román
title: (01207) Área de Servicio Andamur San Román
title_short: (01207) Área de Servicio Andamur San Román
description:
Service area for truckers.
Drainage of black and gray water.
Filled with water.
Self-service laundry.
Supermarket and gas station open 24 hours.
Sale of butane bottles.

title: (20870) San Lorentzo - 35 Sallobente-Ermuaran Bailara
description: Neighborhood with water, bathrooms, games area, bowling, to hang out and rest. It has three tables, one of them double.

title: (20500) Arrasate -
description: Gas station and service area. It offers gray and black drain (although with a grid that makes it unhygienic). Drinking water refill too.

name: Camping Zingira
title: (20809) Camping Zingira
description: Very quiet, surrounded by nature, with lots of shade, large separate plots with hedges, very attentive staff, very clean bathrooms. Very recommendable but expensive.

title: (31849) Irañeta -
description: 1 place on grass in a bend near a water trough. another location is available 3km up towards the pass.

title: (20809) -
description: Quiet site with picnic tables and a barbecue. Surrounded by nature.

title: (20749) Iraeta - 906 Sabea Kalea
description: Next to a football field without shade but very quiet to sleep and bike and walk across the river and a picnic area that you can eat well.

title: (20749) Aizarnazabal - 16 Zubialdea Auzoa
description: Very quiet parking area First we asked a local who told us that there was no problem. In the park in front there is a drinking water fountain, a picnic area and even a public barbecue

title: (20590) Soraluze - 5A Ezozia, Barrio Auzoa
description: Nice place to rest and spend time, summertime shadowy, there is a bar closed to where you can provide.

title: (31840) Uharte-Arakil - Pista a San Miguel de Aralar
title_short: (31840) Uharte-Arakil - Pista a San Miguel de Aralar
description: Quiet corner towards San Miguel Aralar. Nice view and nice crest ballad.

address.street: Pista a San Miguel de Aralar

title: (01207) Eguilaz-Egilatz - 1A Magalondo Kalea
description: Resting place next to the Aizkomendi dolmen. You can spend the night

title: (20550) Aretxabaleta - 14 Goroeta Elizaurrea Auzoa
description: Parking next to the road but almost no cars. There are toilets and from there start the mountain bike routes and hiking. Very quiet. There are wooden tables in full sun, but there is also place in the shade.

title: (31880) Leitza - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful area where you can stop to eat and have a good day, it is a good starting point for various excursions. There is a fountain, several tables and a river where you can bathe. You can leave the motorhome on the side of the road or drive it almost to the grass in the case of a van. We did not dare because the ground is somewhat uneven. I don't know if you can stay overnight. There was a sign not to leave belongings in sight in the vehicles due to the risk of theft.

title: () Navarra - 27 NA-718
description: Several, lots of parking departure of hiking, clean, in the middle of nature, all more friendly than each other.

title: (20590) Gipuzkoa - 18 Ezozia, Barrio Auzoa
description: Calm place, fountain beside Road going Up, some tablets and chairs, as well in fountain and Up the park.

title: (20810) Aia - 57 Olaskoegia Auzoa
description: It is a quiet parking lot, it does not put in any carter forbidden to park to sleep, I suppose that being a town and being far from the city there is no problem. A very quiet place near the Orio town, a place with a lot of charm. We spent the night and rested very well.

title: (31870) Lekunberri - 2 Calle Artzanegi
description: Quiet parking, with an open public bathroom on the side of the pediment (next to the Berri Txarrak mural), in the center of town. Covered playground. There are usually a few motorhomes daily according to what they told us.

title: (01200) - Unnamed Road
description: FORBIDDEN TO SPEND THE NIGHT THERE. Throughout the area, even if on the map it seems outside the natural park, there are very clear signs everywhere to prevent access to the Vans and to all the places that would be accessible. The place is so beautiful that we chose to come back the next day to take a walk after sleeping at the location near the Lèze authorized in the North (see app)

title: (31829) Lizarraga -
description: Fresh water

title: (20550) Arechavaleta - 2 Aozaraza
description: Day and night parking

title: (31870) Lekunberri - 10 Burundegia
description:
Quiet area to park. You can sleep. Quiet place The only thing that will be next to the road next to the road is cars. At night no one passes. You can drain the gray and black water and fill it up with water.
Thanks to the town hall

title: (20690) Elgeta - 73 Goio Asentzio Auzoa Auzoa
description: Very nice and nice place, with tables, fountain and barbecues.

title: (31870) Lekunberri - 1 Iturritak Kalea
description: Very quiet place to sleep. Close to public toilet at the tourist office.

title: (31870) Lekunberri - 20 Plazaola Kalea
description: Quiet parking with the woods on the side and touching the greenway of Plazaola

title: (20500) Arrasate - 10D San Andres Auzoa Auzoa
description: Vehicle washing facilities. A pressure washing station (shampoo, tires, brush, wax ...) for large vehicles.

title: (31870) Lekunberri - 1 Plazaola Kalea
description: It is a parking lot next to the restaurant La Kantina de Lekunberri. It is rather small, and the squares are narrow. More designed for passenger cars of the restaurant than for vans. At the campsite they have toilets and showers. They are clean. It's next to the greenway, so it's a great place for biking and walking. near the town of Lekunberri

name: Camping Aralar
title: (31870) Camping Aralar
description: All amenities. Swimming pool. Free WIFI.

title: (20690) Elgeta - Pateittitik Asentziorako Bidea
description: You are only allowed to stand in the small, dirty parking lot between the streets. The public toilet house stinks. Very unattractive.

title: (20870) Elgoibar - 24 Azkue Bailara
description: Large and spacious parking next to the football field with bar and source. It also has a playground and machines for adults in the open air, and basketball court. The area is also wooded and 5-10 minutes walk from the Centre of Elgoibar. There are bathrooms and bar to be next to the Sports Centre, when it is open. From here the highway is a little heard.

title: (20829) Lastur - 6 San Nikolas Plaza
description: Public parking. The site is spectacular in the middle of nature. Respect the environment and neighbors.
